ðŸ“– Summary: Falcraft is a Minecraft Fabric mod that allows users to generate 3D structures from text prompts and remix block textures using AI. It leverages fal.ai's Meshy v6 for 3D generation and nano-banana for texture editing, providing a seamless, in-game AI-powered creation experience.
